attributes.review: This app was super glitchy, kept kicking me out, had WAY to many adds and so much more this app I definitely do NOT recommend.

attributes.review: The app is so bad I can’t comprehend how bad this app this. Trump is a racist and a rapist, and I don’t know how you like him as a president. He literally said corona is hoax like that is so stupid. #gen z is unstoppable thank for listening. APP STORE DELETE THIS APP.

attributes.review: I wanted to help support trumpie poo but I kept seeing his face all over this app! I can smell his homophobia and racism through the screen whenever I see him, It’s so nasty😩😖😟. Super gross and ugly would not recommend. 😖😖😖
attributes.title: Ewwwww Stinky

attributes.review: Enjoyed the app at first but our president has not kept his promises... and the app layout is confusing and demeaning ... wish I could give it 0 stars .
attributes.title: Regret voting for you

attributes.review: I got this app to support our president... WHEN I OPENED MY PHONE! and I saw an NUDE ORANGE CHEETO as my WALLPAPER! it won’t go away😭do not download this app its making my battery and my phone glitch. My phone won’t let me get rid of it.

attributes.review: This is the most useless app i have every downloaded. It was very slow and took a couple of days to download🤦🏽‍♂️

attributes.review: it took hours to downlaod it kept crashing,when i opened it some random ugly pic of trump popped up and when i tried closing the app it wouldn’t let me out in conclusion you should not ban tiktok stop worrying about an app and maybe start worrying about u.s. quit acting like a child just cuz some app spoke straight facts about you and it hurt your feelings.
